summary: Iteration 22 - Frontend UI Redesign Testing. All major pages (Dashboard, Bookings, Services, Analytics, Products, Team, Settings, ShareLink/BookingPage) verified working with new colorful design matching mobile app style. All pages load correctly with pastel-colored stat cards, rounded-2xl corners, entrance animations, and hover effects. No JavaScript errors found.

issues: Minor Recharts library warning about chart dimensions - chart still renders correctly

passed_tests: Dashboard page loads at /dashboard with colorful stat cards (Today, Total bookings, Show rate, Revenue)
Dashboard shows Share CTA section with teal background
Dashboard displays Today's Schedule section
Dashboard shows Quick Actions grid with colorful icons
Dashboard has Smart Tips section with purple/teal tips
Bookings page loads at /bookings with colored stats row (Total, Confirmed, Pending, Cancelled)
Bookings page has search and filter functionality
Services page loads at /services with Add Service button
Services page shows empty state correctly
Analytics page loads at /analytics with colored stat cards
Analytics page displays Revenue chart (Last 30 Days)
Analytics page shows Bookings by Service section
Products page loads at /products with Add Product button
Products page has search functionality
Team page loads at /team with Add Team Member button
Team page has search functionality
Settings page loads at /settings with tabbed interface
Settings tabs work (Profile, Hours, Booking, Payments, Reminders, Support)
Share/Booking Page loads at /share with booking link and QR code
Share page has Business Identity, Contact Details, Social Media sections
Sidebar navigation works correctly for all pages
No JavaScript console errors on any page

dashboard_redesign.colorful_stat_cards: Pastel backgrounds - mint/teal, amber/yellow, purple, blue
dashboard_redesign.share_cta: Teal background with white text, chevron icon

analytics_redesign.stat_cards: Total Revenue (teal), Total Bookings (amber), Completed (green), No-Show Rate (red)
analytics_redesign.services_chart: Horizontal bar chart with colorful bars

settings_redesign.tabs: Profile, Hours, Booking, Payments, Reminders, Support

animations.stagger_delays: anim-d1 through anim-d8 for cascading effects

navigation.sidebar: All 8 main links working (Dashboard, Calendar, Bookings, Team, Services, Products, Analytics, Support, Settings)
navigation.active_state: Light teal background for active page

critical_code_review_comments: All pages properly use data-testid attributes for testing
CSS animations defined in App.css with proper keyframes
Consistent use of tailwind classes for colors (bg-[#E8F5F3], bg-[#FEF3E2], bg-[#EDE9FE], bg-[#DBEAFE], etc.)
Rounded-2xl corners consistently applied to cards and sections
Hover effects with scale and shadow transitions working smoothly
Minor Recharts warning about chart dimensions is a library issue, not affecting functionality

success_rate.backend: N/A - Backend not tested (frontend only testing)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend pages have been redesigned to match mobile app style with colorful pastel stat cards, rounded-2xl corners, entrance animations (anim-fade-up, anim-scale-in, anim-slide-right), and hover effects. All pages verified working: Dashboard, Bookings, Services, Analytics, Products, Team, Settings, ShareLink/BookingPage. Navigation works correctly. No JavaScript errors on any page.
